Search Term:

); } const search_term_style = { color: "white", fontSize: "20pt", lineHeight: "30px" } const close_btn_style = { color: "white", height: "40px", width: "40px", float: "right", margin: "0 5px 0 160px" } const searchbar_style = { height: "200px", width: "100%", position: "absolute", top: "8vh", zIndex: 3, backgroundColor: "black", display: "flex" } export default SearchBar
